data.title: Jamie Lynn Spears's Biography from Teen Idols 4 You
data.meta_description: Jamie Lynn Spears's biography along with photos, filmography, and idol news.
data.text:
Jamie Lynn Spears Biography

Biography

Biography

Date of Birth

4 December 1991, McComb, Mississippi, USA

Birth Name

Jamie Lynn Marie Spears

Nickname

JL

Height

5' 4½" (1.64 m)

Mini Biography

Jamie Lynn Spears was born on April 4, 1991 in McComb, Mississippi and raised in Kentwood, Louisiana to Lynne Spears & Jamie Spears. Her family also includes her older brother, Bryan Spears, and her older sister, Britney Spears. Jamie Lynn has always been a performer, like her sister Britney. She loved gymnastics, dance, acting, and singing growing up. Jamie Lynn's first on-screen role was in her sister's movie, Crossroads (2002). She is the proud mother of Maddie Briann Aldridge, who was born on June 19, 2008. Her daughter's father, Casey Aldridge is her ex-fiancÃ©. Jamie Lynn Spears now resides in Louisiana, with her husband Jamie Watson and her daughter, where she is pursuing a country music singing career.

Trivia

Moved to NYC with her mom and sister when she was only a few months old so her sister could pursue her entertainment career.

Younger sister of Bryan Spears & Britney Spears.

Has played on her junior high softball team. Moreover, she is taking gymnastics after school, which sister Britney also did as a child.

Has three rottweilers named Cane, Spotty, and Sebastian; a teacup poodle named Lady; a german shepherd; two shizu terriers named Mitzi and Bitzi; a pomeranian named Izzy; and a few guard dogs.

Spent the summer of 2004 in California filming the first season of Zoey 101 (2005). A friend from home, Leigha, spent the summer with her.

Has a brown maltese dog named Ally.

Is friends with Emma Roberts

Collects porcelain dolls.

Has a Yorkie dog named Beau (2005)

Ex-sister-in-law of Kevin Federline and Jason Alexander.

Suffers from asthma but only in moderation.

Sean Federline, Jayden Federline & Lexie Spears' aunt.

Sister-in-law of Graciella Sanchez.

Lynne Spears & Jamie Spears' youngest daughter.

Filming Zoey 101 (2005). [July 2005]

Plans to release country album. [March 2009]

Will star in her upcoming Nickelodeon TV show Zoey 101 (2005). [June 2004]

Working on All That (1994). [July 2002]

Started 8th grade and playing on the softball team at Parklane Academy. [August 2004]

Finishing the 7th grade at Parklane Academy. [April 2004]

Living in Kentwood, Louisiana, preparing for the birth of her first baby. [March 2008]

Jamie Lynn prefers gymnastics over dancing. Jamie Lynn doesn't know how to dance.

Released EP titled "The Journey" on May 27, 2014.

She has English, with smaller amounts (to varying degrees) of Italian, Scottish, Scots-Irish (Northern Irish), Irish, French, and Welsh, ancestry. Her maternal grandmother, Lilian Irene Portell, was an English-born war bride. Jamie Lynn's Italian ancestry is from one of Lilian Portell's grandfathers, Edward Richard Portelli.

On 2005, Jamie Lynn began dating Casey Aldridge.

Jamie Lynn is shy in real life. Until her pregnancy with daughter Maddie, she was a cheerleader at Parklane Academy. When she was younger, Jamie Lynn though cheerleading was stupid. After signing up for gymnastics she decided that she wanted to pursue cheerleading.

(March 14, 2014) Married her on-off boyfriend of 3 years Jamie Watson in New Orleans following a 12-month-long engagement.

On February 5, 2017 her 8-year-old daughter Maddie was hospitalized after being seriously hurt in an ATV accident. The 8-year-old was on a Polaris off-road vehicle for a "hunting expedition" when it flipped over. Maddie was reportedly under water for several minutes. Shortly after Maddie woke up, and was able to return home from the hospital less than a week later.

Has 2 daughters: Maddie Aldridge (b. June 19, 2008) with ex-fiancÃ©, Casey Aldridge & Ivey Watson (b. April 11, 2018) with husband, Jamie Watson.

On December 20, 2007, Jamie Lynn announced that she and boyfriend Casey Aldridge were expecting a child together.

Jamie Lynn & Casey reconciled on August 13, 2010, but they split again on November 10, 2010.

Engaged to Casey Aldridge from March 25, 2008 to December 27, 2009.

Jamie Lynn Spears was the youngest cast member of "All That" until Christina Kirkman came along.

Jamie Lynn Spears was a featured artist on former pop rap band Triple Image's version of "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun".

Before being cast in "All That" she was in an E-Kara commercial. Jamie Lynn Spears is a tomboy.

Her unplanned pregnancy at age 16 in 2007 forced her to take a hiatus from her acting career. She wouldn't have an acting role for another 12 years until Sweet Magnolias (2020).

Trademarks:

Blonde dyed hair

Brown eyes

Quotes

I would like to be like Britney, but maybe better, but I don't wanna outshine her.

I'll probably do a lot of acting first, then go to singing, but I am going to definitely sing someday. So when I do start singing, buy my album! - upon starting her career in show business

I'm more honest in my lyrics than I am in anything else. It's where I feel the most safe to express myself. I write about growing up, my family, Maddie and getting pregnant. If I've lived it, why wouldn't I talk about it? I guess that's been the coolest thing-realizing that it's OK to just be myself and really tell my story.

[On why Britney chose to sing pop music and Jamie chose country] Every person in this world has a different outlet for them where they release their creative energies or whatever energies they need to release. It's just the way she chose to release hers and this is how I chose to release mine.
